text: have you won today let's make something
really simple easy and refreshing salad
with red cabbage and trims is called
pop-up cutting in Vietnamese hello
recipes you're gonna need a quarter of a
red cabbage cut into really thin strips
you will get about three cups of
shredded back cabbage next Drive right
ten prawns in a hot pan without any oil
you want to keep stirring until the
prawns turn completely orange on all
sides then peel the prawns cut in half
lengthwise and remove the backlight
tonight the salad dressing is together 2
tbsp sugar 2 tbsp fish sauce and 2 tbsp
of lime juice or lemon juice and then
stir well when the sugar is completely
dissolved add some minced garlic and
chilies so they can float on top
in a large mixing bowl mix the shrimps
with a tablespoon of the salad dressings
and some cracked pepper then add the
shredded red cabbage and grease or more
dressings to your taste give it a really
good toss then add some of your favorite
herbs live Vietnamese mint or brown
means or bad sauce if you like that's it
it's now ready to plate
you can garnish with some crusts lots of
peanuts to add more crunch to the salad
and that you have it a super simple
colorful and tasty summer salad I hope
you like it thank you for watching bye
bye
